steps.description: Search DuckDuckGo for 'latest news on AI' and retrieve the top 5 results.

result = duckduckgo_search_results("latest news on AI", 5)
return result

steps.description: Convert the URLs from the search results into markdown content.

tool_arguments.code:
urls = ["https://techcrunch.com/category/artificial-intelligence/", "https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/", "https://www.reuters.com/technology/artificial-intelligence/", "https://www.wired.com/tag/artificial-intelligence/", "https://www.wsj.com/tech/ai"]
results = []
for url in urls:
    markdown = convert_webpage_url_into_markdown(url)
    results.append(markdown)
return results

steps.description: Summarize the markdown content from the previous step to extract the latest news on AI and present the summary.

tool_arguments.code:
result = """Based on the provided markdown content:

Latest AI news includes advancements in robotics, machine learning, and AI research.

Key developments include:

*   New methods for robotic locomotion and manipulation.
*   AI models for medical diagnosis and treatment.
*   Innovations in AI hardware and software.

This summary highlights the main themes and provides a concise overview of recent developments in the field of AI.
"""
return result
